name: VaporWave Platformer Prototype
description:
Developed by @OneratDylan for the Jamingtons Game Jam, audio by Tearacotta.

Experimental  M.C. Escher inspired 3D platformer with a simple solid color art style rendered in pixel art.

Collect all 3 emitting shards to compete prototype (Shards are teal and have red particles emitting from them).

Weekly updates.

Controls

  • "W,A,S,D" Movement.
  • "Space" Jump.
  • "Left Click" Fire beam.
  • "R" will move the player back to the last checkpoint.
  • "Esc" Show exit button and cursor.
  • "G" make the  player dance.

Gamepad support coming.

If you enjoyed the prototype please think about rating it.

Would love to hear your thoughts.

Join the community: https://discordapp.com/invite/oneratgames

Patreon Page: https://www.patreon.com/OneratGames
